title: Hot Dogs, Horsehoes & Hand Grenades
notes: It's been a while since I played it on Windows but the experience seemed absolutely smooth and flawless to me.

title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes & Hand Grenades
notes: If SteamVR latency increases, open up the VR dashboard and then close it again; this should drastically lower latency. (This applies to all of Linux SteamVR in my experience)
Significant input latency that leads to severe motion sickness to those inclined to it. But, no crashes detected, and performance was similar to Windows.
title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes & Hand Grenades
